translations: n.流氓；阿飞；行为鲁莽的人

phrs.translation: 撕纸小邮差, 折纸世界, 行动鲁莽的, 行动莽撞的人
撕纸小邮差拆封, 折纸世界展开, 折纸世界
你别笑了眼泪都掉了, 你别笑了

sentences.sentence: Anything from a humble bread and butter family saloon to a tearaway sports racer.
sentences.translation: 什么面包黄油家庭房谦卑的现身说法体育跑车。

sentences.sentence: In 1976, George Pelecanos, creator of the Wire, was an 18-year-old tearaway and a disappointment to his father.
sentences.translation: 乔治·佩利凯诺，《火线》剧作者。1976那年，他18岁，还是街头小混混，父亲对他失望之极。

sentences.sentence: NEIGHBOURS of a teenage tearaway set to be booted out of her Colchester home have spoken of the "nightmare" they have endured living near her.
sentences.translation: 一位十几岁的小流氓被赶出了她科尔切斯特的家，她的邻居说到了住在她附近所忍受的“梦魇”。
